objects.description: [Pony](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0453) attachments have been delivered via compressed archive files. [Pony](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0453) also obfuscates the memory flow by adding junk instructions when executing to make analysis more difficult.(Citation: Malwarebytes Pony April 2016)

external_references.description: hasherezade. (2016, April 11). No money, but Pony! From a mail to a trojan horse. Retrieved May 21, 2020.
